## Description {#details}

Used in the streaming interface as the general argument type.

It internally converts everything into a key-value pair.

Definition at line 499 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/diagnosticinfo-h">DiagnosticInfo.h</a>.
